name: GeneralLedgerTransactions_GetAll
description:
Get a range of General Ledger Transactions - ScreenId=GL404000
Please use a page size lower or equal to the allowed max page size which is returned under metadata. 
If pagesize is greater than the max page size, it will be limited to max page size.

ledger.description: Mandatory. The ledger in which you want to view the account balances.

fromPeriod.description: The financial period that begins the date range of the batches you want to view. Format YYYYPP

toPeriod.description: The financial period that ends the date range of the batches you want to view. Format YYYYPP

account.description: The account CD for which you want to view activities in the selected financial period.

fromDate.description: The first date of the interval within the period. Format YYYY-MM-DD

toDate.description: The last date of the interval within the selected period. Format YYYY-MM-DD

includeUnposted.description: Checkmark indicating if unposted batches are included.

includeUnreleased.description: Checkmark indicating if unreleased (balanced) batches are included.

skipRecords.description: This field has been deprecated and will be removed in future versions. Use pagenumber and pagesize for pagination purposes. Pagenumber and pagesize does not work with NumberToRead and SkipRecords.

numberToRead.description: This field has been deprecated and will be removed in future versions. Use pagenumber and pagesize for pagination purposes. Pagenumber and pagesize does not work with NumberToRead and SkipRecords.

lastModifiedDateTime.description:
This value, generated by the system, indicates the last time the record was modified. Use it to retrieve all records that have been modified since that time, up to the present.

Accepted format:
* ```yyyy-MM-dd```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.FFF```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.FFF```

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

lastModifiedDateTimeCondition.description:
This value represents the condition to be applied when retrieving records.

Accepted values (without the single quotes):
* '>' for greater than
* '<' for less than
* '>=' for greater than or equal
* '<=' for less than or equal

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

expandAccountInfo.description:
By default, if no value is provided, False and the account information will include only Number, Description, Type and GlConsolAccountCD.
If True, each transaction returned will include extended information about account.

expandBranchInfo.description:
By default, if no value is provided, False and branch information will include only branch number.
If True, each transaction returned will include extended information about Branch (number and name).

includeTransactionBalance.description:
By default, if no value is provided, False and the transactions returned will not include their balances (fields BegBalance, EndingBalance, CurrBegBalance, CurrEndingBalance)
If True, each transaction returned will include its balance.

pageSize.description:
Pagination parameter. Number of items to be collected.
Please use a page size lower or equal to the allowed max page size which is returned as part of the metadata information.
If requested page size is greater than allowed max page size, request will be limited to max page size.

erp-api-background.description: If a URL value is provided, then API endpoint will be queued and executed in background. When the execution of the background operation is finished, the system will POST the response to the specified URL. The endpoint itself responds in this case with a 202-Accepted status and a reference to a state document for the background operation.

$ul: **account**: Account > The account updated by the batch transactions.
**description**: Name of item/description
**externalCode1**: ExternalCode1 is deprecated, please use ExternalCode1Info instead.
**externalCode1Info**
**description**: Name of item/description
**number**: Number of item
**externalCode2**: ExternalCode2 is deprecated, please use ExternalCode2Info instead.
**externalCode2Info**
**description**: Name of item/description
**number**: Number of item
**glConsolAccountCD**
**number**: Number of item
**type**
**batchNumber**: Batch number > The reference number of the batch (generated for the transaction) that updated the balance of the selected account.
**begBalance**: Beg. balance > The running total of the account's beginning balance calculated in the order of transactions displayed in the table.
**branch**: Branch > The branch of the company.
**name**: Click the magnifier. > The name.
**number**: Click the magnifier. > The identifier.
**creditAmount**: Credit amount > The transaction credit amount charged to the account during the selected financial period.
**currBegBalance**: Beg. balance (currency) > The account balance in the selected currency at the start of the selected period.
**currCreditAmount**: Credit amount (currency) > The credit amount in the selected currency for the specified account over the selected period.
**currDebitAmount**: Debit amount (currency) > The debit amount in the selected currency for the specified account over the selected period.
**currEndingBalance**: Ending balance (currency) > The account balance in the selected currency at the start of the selected period.
**currency**: Click the Show currency details check box to view the below fields in the window.
**debitAmount**: Debit amount > The transaction debit amount charged to the account during the selected financial period.
**description**: Description > The user-defined description of the transaction.
**endingBalance**: Ending balance > The running total of the account's ending balance calculated in the order of transactions displayed in the table.
**errorInfo**
**lastModifiedDateTime**: System generated information reflecting when the last change was done.
**ledger**: Ledger > The ledger used for the batch.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**lineNumber**
**metadata**
**maxPageSize**
**totalCount**
**module**: Workspace > The workspace where the transaction originated.
**period**: Period > The financial period of the transaction.
**refNumber**: Ref. number > The reference number of the external document on which this transaction is based.
**subaccount**: Subaccount > The subaccount used in the batch.
**tranDate**: Trans date > The date of the transaction.
**stateLocation**
